src_original: samāsataś caturvidho gaṇanāparicayaḥ (Śbh II 86) /  tadyathaikaikagaṇanā,  dvayaikagaṇanā,  anulomagaṇanā,  pratilomagaṇanā ca //  tatraikaikagaṇanā katamā /
tgt_original: 一數、二隨、三安四相、五轉、六淨。

src_original: yadāśvāsaḥ praviṣṭo bhavati,  tadāśvāsapraśvāsālambanopanibaddhayā smṛtyaikam iti gaṇayati /  yadāśvāse niruddhe praśvāsa utpadya nirgato bhavati tadā dvitīyaṃ gaṇayati,  evaṃ yāvad daśa gaṇayati /
tgt_original: 此中於入出二息中不作功用，與心捨身心相，唯由念數一二乃至十。

src_original: eṣā hi gaṇanā saṃkhyā nātisaṃkṣiptā nātivistarā /  iyam ucyata ekaikagaṇanā //
tgt_original: 由畏心略及亂，是故不少不多。

src_original: iyam ucyate pratilomagaṇanā /  yadā sa ekaikagaṇanāṃ niśritya dvayaikagaṇanāṃ vā,
tgt_original: 一減數，謂若二數一； 二長數，謂若一數二。
三雜亂數，謂若入數出、若出數入。

src_original: na cāsyāntarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate,  avikṣiptacittaś ca gaṇayati,  tadāsyottaragaṇanāviśeṣo vyapadiśyate //  katamo gaṇanāviśeṣaḥ /  ekaikagaṇanayā vā,  dvayaikagaṇanayā vā,

dvayam ekaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /  iyatā tena gaṇanāparicayaḥ kṛto bhavati /  tasya ca gaṇanāprayuktasya saced antarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate,  tadā punaḥ pratinivartyādito gaṇayitum ārabhate 'nulomaṃ vā,  pratilomaṃ vā /
tgt_original: 中間若亂，更從初數，乃至得定。
